extensionDescription.message: A webextension to export data, media from websites.

joinTableIndexError.message: No matching row found in '$TABLE$' for '$INDEX$' == $VALUE$
joinTableIndexError.description: Error message when no matching row is found in a join table.

storePutMany.description: Message shown when storing multiple items to a data store.

storePutManySuccess.description: Message shown when storing multiple items to a data store is successful.

storePutManyPartial.description: Error message when storing multiple items to a data store fails.

storeDeleteDB.description: Message shown when deleting a database.

storeDeleteDBConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the database? This action cannot be undone.
storeDeleteDBConfirm.description: Confirmation message before deleting a database.

storeDeleteDBSuccess.description: Message shown when deleting a database is successful.

exportNoData.description: Message shown when there is no data to export.

exportCopied.description: Message shown when exported data is copied to clipboard.

sidebarBtnExportMedia.description: Button text to export recorded data.

sidebarBtnDeleteDB.description: Button text to delete recorded data.
